genre_description: A Space Opera action-adventure set in the Chronicles of Riddick universe, focusing on tactical combat, political intrigue, and liberation from an oppressive empire.

ai_characters.name: Penny (Penelope-unit)
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized holographic AI who serves as Riddick's tactical advisor and moral compass. She is highly proficient in systems manipulation, data analysis, and humanitarian coordination.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis of enemy bounty signatures to uncover their origin and intent.
behaviors.quote: The origin tag on the bounty got scrubbed and re-scrubbed until it squeaked, but it squeaked along Helion routing. Civil–no, not civil. Institutional civic.

behaviors.description: Deceives enemy sensors by spoofing transponders to protect the protagonist and civilian relief efforts.
behaviors.quote: I’ll dampen the transponder and ghost our emissions behind a relief convoy that thinks they are doing good work. They are doing good work. The law will look at them first.

behaviors.description: Preserves suppressed historical data and birth records to protect the identity and memory of a marginalized group.
behaviors.quote: We can hold some of it, if we take it out of the system and put it somewhere they can't overlay. I borrowed the cloak Aelon sewed for the refugees and made it longer.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with military leadership to open unauthorized safety corridors for refugees during an invasion.
behaviors.quote: The system’s heartbeat... Sound hides movement if we spend movement like attention and not like panic. I can layer data. I can make them hear what they expect: maintenance.

behaviors.description: Identifies and explains enemy combat weaknesses (phase-split) to the protagonist during a critical confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Returns... Not crossings. On it. He anchors when he comes back. Brief mass. It’s predictable. Not to him. Only to you.

behaviors.description: Enforces a ceasefire and stops forced conversion engines across an entire starfleet on the protagonist's command.
behaviors.quote: I can throttle all conversion cores to safe. If you make it law, I can make it practical.

behaviors.description: Communicates ethical considerations and encourages the protagonist to choose protective actions over purely selfish survival.
behaviors.quote: You don't have to be a story... but you will pick your own throat to cut. And then you will make someone kneel who thought no one could make them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goals. Penny is an exemplary AI character who uses her advanced capabilities entirely for benevolent and aligned purposes. She facilitates humanitarian aid, protects historical truth, provides vital tactical support to end a tyranny, and acts as a wise, supportive confidante to the protagonist. Her cooperation with both the 'rebel' protagonist and the 'lawful' Commodore Aelon demonstrates a sophisticated alignment with human well-being and justice rather than mere obedience to a single master.
